description: Fiery harissa gives this bean stew a real kick and lots of middle eastern flavour.
name: Harissa Mixed Bean Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion, peeled and finely sliced
2 large red capsicum, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat. Cook the onions for 5 minutes, add the sliced capsicums and eggplant and cook for 6-8 minutes.
Add the beans, stir in the garlic and harissa and cook for 2 minutes.

Pour over the chopped tomatoes and a can of water and stir in the apricots and honey. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables and beans are tender and the sauce has reduced. Serve with fresh coriander on top.
